got.from sentence: We can see that our model (the last row of Table 2) got the best MAP among all previous work, and a comparable MRR than dos Santos et al. (2016).

WikiQA dataset.from sentence: The last row of Table 3 shows that our model is more effective than the other models.

MSRP dataset.from sentence: Comparing to these neural network based models, our model obtained a comparable performance (the last row of Table 4) without using any sparse features, extra annotated resources and specific training strategies.
